OnboardingCustomizations.onboardingFailedMessageString: User onboarding has failed due to an error. Please try again or contact your administrator.
OnboardingCustomizations.networkUnreachableFailureString: Network unreachable. Please try again later.
OnboardingCustomizations.eulaTitleString: Acuerdo de licencia de usuario final
OnboardingCustomizations.setPasscodeMessageFormat: Choose a passcode with at least {0} characters for unlocking the app.
OnboardingCustomizations.passcodeNotMatchMessageString: Passcodes did not match. Try again.
OnboardingCustomizations.enterCredentialsMessageString: Please sign in to reset the passcode.
OnboardingCustomizations.fingerprintEnableDetailLabel: Use your fingerprint for faster and easier access to your account.
OnboardingCustomizations.fingerprintAlertMessageText: In order to use your fingerprint. You need to register at least one of your fingerprint in settings
OnboardingCustomizations.fingerprintDetailLabel:
Touch sensor to sign in with your fingerprint.
Or, you can use a passcode to sign in.
OnboardingCustomizations.faceIDEnableMessage1String: Please enable Face ID for fast and secure access.
OnboardingCustomizations.faceIDEnableMessage2String: If Face ID is deactivated, you will be asked for your device passcode.
OnboardingCustomizations.faceIDMessage1String: Enabling Face ID will give you faster access to your information.
OnboardingCustomizations.faceIDMessage2String: You can turn this feature on or off at anytime from Settings.
OnboardingCustomizations.touchIDEnableMessage1String: Please enable Touch ID for fast and secure access.
OnboardingCustomizations.touchIDEnableMessage2String: If Touch ID is deactivated, you will be asked for your device passcode.
OnboardingCustomizations.touchIDMessage1String: Enabling Touch ID will give you faster access to your information.
OnboardingCustomizations.touchIDMessage2String: You can turn this feature on or off at anytime from Settings.
